adverb.description: In a way that is not firmly or tightly fixed or held together.
examples: her hair hung loosely over her shoulders
a bow tied loosely at the collar

adverb.description: In a way that does not fit tightly or closely.
examples: cover loosely with foil and bake in a preheated oven

adverb.description: In a way that is not close, compact, or solid in structure or formation.
examples: buildings are grouped loosely around a village green
spinach can be packed loosely in a plastic bag
he moved loosely from side to side
